Package com.example.repository

Interface ItemsForPeriodRepository

@RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=ItemsForPeriod.class, idClass=java.lang.Integer.class) public interface ItemsForPeriodRepository
Repository interface for managing ItemsForPeriod entities. Provides methods to query items for a specified period and their count.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Long
    countItemsForPeriod(LocalDate start, LocalDate end, long id)
    Retrieves the total count of items for a specified period.
    List<ItemsForPeriod>
    getItemsForPeriod(LocalDate start, LocalDate end, long id, long pageSize, long pageNumber)
    Retrieves a list of items for a specified period with the maximum cost to buy per day.

  • Method Details

    • getItemsForPeriod

      @Query("select * from get_max_cost_buy_per_day_for_period(:start, :end, :id::integer) limit :page_size offset :page_number * :page_size") List<ItemsForPeriod> getItemsForPeriod(@Param("start") LocalDate start, @Param("end") LocalDate end, @Param("id") long id, @Param("page_size") long pageSize, @Param("page_number") long pageNumber)
      Retrieves a list of items for a specified period with the maximum cost to buy per day.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date of the period
      end - the end date of the period
      id - the ID associated with the period
      pageSize - the number of items to retrieve per page
      pageNumber - the page number for pagination
      Returns:
      a list of items for the specified period

    • countItemsForPeriod

      @Query("select count(*) from get_max_cost_buy_per_day_for_period(:start, :end, :id::integer)") Long countItemsForPeriod(@Param("start") LocalDate start, @Param("end") LocalDate end, @Param("id") long id)
      Retrieves the total count of items for a specified period.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date of the period
      end - the end date of the period
      id - the ID associated with the period
      Returns:
      the total count of items for the specified period
